decision_conditions:
<div>The siting, scale and design of the proposed garage would create a harsh and overly prominent feature along Bainbridge Road, at odds with the main building line along the road, resulting in a loss of openness and symmetry of the streetscene and creating an overbearing impact for pedestrians and users of the highway. The flat roof would further fail to reflect the character of the area.&nbsp; This is&nbsp;<span style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);">considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area,&nbsp;</span>notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</div><div><br></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">&nbsp;</span>National Planning Policy Framework
(NPPF) (DLUHC, December 2023)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies CP2 and CP3 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core
Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">-
Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the </span>Local Development Framework (LDF)
Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 107%; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- Section 5.7.1 of the Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal">









</p><p><b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">- </span></b><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: " pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of </span>The London Borough of
Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version,
December 2021)<o:p></o:p></p></div>
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
description: Construction of an outbuilding to be used as a garage
